docs.title: Welcome to fortran.rs
docs.text:
An interpreter for the Fortran programming language written in Rust.

This is the documentation for the fortran.rs project.

docs.title: From Source
docs.text:
Clone the repository and build the project.

git clone https://github.com/Xavier2p/fortran.rs.git
cd fortran.rs
cargo build --release
./target/release/fortran-rs <file>

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• -v - Verbose, print the comments
  • -Werror - Treat warnings as errors
  • -h - Print help

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:

├── Cargo.lock
├── Cargo.toml
├── LICENSE
├── README.md

│   ├── runtime.rs

│   └── main.rs
└── tests
